attributes.action: introduce legislation to institute a system of "Recall Elections" within the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A 'Recall Election' is a procedure by which voters can remove an elected official(s) from office.

Prime Minister, there are many who feel that in Britain, Democracy ends at the Ballot Box!  The two cornerstones of your government are said to be 'Stability' and 'Fairness' yet all too often, we who live in this supposed democracy often feel ignored and under valued. Perhaps with a 'recall election' system available to the wider population governments, national and local, might be more inclined to listen to and take note of the wishes of the people.
